description.value:
Contained within this small glass tube is a twisted wire filament crackling with electricity, sending static prickling through the hair of anyone holding it. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 29.

  • Armor You gain resistance 5 to electricity.
  • Weapon After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional @Damage[1d8[electricity]] damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.pnBdSjOtQb9T1ajL]{Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Major)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.ceIvpmxWqBJpBHIn]{Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Major)}

@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Jolt Coil Spell|traits:spell|showDC:all]

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.n7OgbKme4hNwxVwQ]{Draw the Lightning}.
